contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary}} '''Mongolian''' may refer to: * Something of, from, or related to [[Mongolia]], a landlocked country in East and Central Asia that borders Russia to the north and People's Republic of China to the south, east and west. * Mongolians, [[Mongols]]. * [[Mongolian language]]. See also [[Languages of Mongolia]]. * [[Mongolian alphabet]] * [[Mongolian (Unicode block)]] * [[Mongolian cuisine]] * ([[Race (historical definitions)|historical]]) the race native to [[East Asia]] (later also [[Mongoloid]]) == See also == * [[Special:Allpages/Mongolian|List of all pages beginning with "Mongolian"]] {{disambig}}
